verses.verse: Of the blue, <S%H8504><s%> purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> they made <S%H6213><s%> finely worked <S%H8278><s%> garments, <S%H899><s%> for ministering <S%H8334><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, <S%H6213><s%> and made the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron; <S%H175><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
He made <S%H6213><s%> the ephod <S%H646><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> blue, <S%H8504><s%> purple, <S%H713><s%> scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen. <S%H8336><s%>

They beat <S%H7554><s%> the gold <S%H2091><s%> into <S%H854><s%> thin plates, <S%H6341><s%> and cut <S%H7112><s%> it into wires, <S%H6616><s%> to work <S%H6213><s%> it in the blue, <S%H8504><s%> in the purple, <S%H713><s%> in the scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> and in the fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of the skillful workman. <S%H2803><s%>
They made <S%H6213><s%> shoulder <S%H3802><s%> straps for it, <S%H2266><s%> joined together. At the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> it was joined together. <S%H2266><s%>

The skillfully woven band <S%H2805><s%> that was on it, <S%H642><s%> with which to fasten it on, <S%H4639><s%> was of the same piece, like its work; of gold, <S%H2091><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> purple, <S%H713><s%> scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen; <S%H8336><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

They worked <S%H6213><s%> the onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> enclosed <S%H4142><s%> in settings <S%H4865><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> engraved <S%H6605><s%> with the engravings <S%H6605><s%> of a signet, <S%H2368><s%> according to the names <S%H8034><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

He put <S%H7760><s%> them on the shoulder <S%H3802><s%> straps of the ephod, <S%H646><s%> to be stones <S%H68><s%> of memorial <S%H2146><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

He made <S%H6213><s%> the breastplate, <S%H2833><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of a skillful <S%H2803><s%> workman, <S%H4639><s%> like the work of the ephod; <S%H646><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> purple, <S%H713><s%> scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen. <S%H8336><s%>

It was square. <S%H7251><s%> They made <S%H6213><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> double. <S%H3717><s%> Its length <S%H753><s%> was a span, <S%H2239><s%> and its breadth <S%H7341><s%> a span, <S%H2239><s%> being double. <S%H3717><s%>

They set <S%H4390><s%> in it four <S%H702><s%> rows <S%H2905><s%> of stones. <S%H68><s%> A row <S%H2905><s%> of ruby, <S%H124><s%> topaz, <S%H6357><s%> and beryl <S%H1304><s%> was the first <S%H259><s%> row; <S%H2905><s%>
and the second <S%H8145><s%> row, <S%H2905><s%> a turquoise, <S%H3095><s%> a sapphire, <S%H5601><s%> and an emerald; <S%H5306><s%>
and the third <S%H7992><s%> row, <S%H2905><s%> a jacinth, <S%H3958><s%> an agate, <S%H7618><s%> and an amethyst; <S%H306><s%>

and the fourth <S%H7243><s%> row, <S%H2905><s%> a chrysolite, <S%H8658><s%> an onyx, <S%H7718><s%> and a jasper. <S%H3471><s%> They were enclosed <S%H4142><s%> in <S%H4865><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> settings. <S%H4865><s%>

The stones <S%H68><s%> were according to the names <S%H8034><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> twelve, <S%H8147><s%> according to their names; <S%H8034><s%> like the engravings <S%H6603><s%> of a signet, <S%H2368><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> according to his name, <S%H8034><s%> for the twelve <S%H8147><s%> tribes. <S%H7626><s%>
They made <S%H6213><s%> on the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> chains <S%H8333><s%> like cords, <S%H1383><s%> of braided <S%H5688><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%>

They made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> settings <S%H4865><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> rings, <S%H2885><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> on the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastplate. <S%H2833><s%>

They put <S%H5414><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> braided chains <S%H5688><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> in the two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> at the ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastplate. <S%H2833><s%>

The other two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> braided <S%H5688><s%> chains <S%H5688><s%> they put <S%H5414><s%> on the two <S%H8147><s%> settings, <S%H4865><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> them on the shoulder <S%H3802><s%> straps of the ephod, <S%H646><s%> in its <S%H4136><s%> front. <S%H6440><s%>

They made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> them on the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastplate, <S%H2833><s%> on its edge, <S%H8193><s%> which was toward the side <S%H5676><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> inward. <S%H1004><s%>

They made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> them on the two <S%H8147><s%> shoulder <S%H3802><s%> straps of the ephod <S%H646><s%> underneath, <S%H4295><s%> in <S%H4136><s%> its front, <S%H6440><s%> close <S%H5980><s%> by its coupling, <S%H4225><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> the skillfully woven band <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod. <S%H646><s%>

They bound <S%H7405><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> by its rings <S%H2885><s%> to the rings <S%H2885><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> with a lace <S%H6616><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> that it might be on the skillfully woven band <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod, <S%H646><s%> and that the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> might not come loose <S%H2118><s%> from the ephod, <S%H646><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
He made <S%H6213><s%> the robe <S%H4598><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> of woven <S%H707><s%> work, <S%H4639><s%> all <S%H3632><s%> of blue. <S%H8504><s%>

The opening <S%H6310><s%> of the robe <S%H4598><s%> in its midst <S%H8432><s%> was like the opening <S%H6310><s%> of a coat <S%H8473><s%> of mail, <S%H8193><s%> with a binding around <S%H5439><s%> its opening, <S%H6310><s%> that it should not be torn. <S%H7167><s%>

They made <S%H6213><s%> on the skirts <S%H7757><s%> of the robe <S%H4598><s%> pomegranates <S%H7416><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> purple, <S%H713><s%> scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> and twined linen. <S%H7806><s%>

They made <S%H6213><s%> bells <S%H6472><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the bells <S%H6472><s%> between <S%H8432><s%> the pomegranates <S%H7416><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the skirts <S%H7757><s%> of the robe, <S%H4598><s%> between <S%H8432><s%> the pomegranates; <S%H7416><s%>

a bell <S%H6472><s%> and a pomegranate, <S%H7416><s%> a bell <S%H6472><s%> and a pomegranate, <S%H7416><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the skirts <S%H7757><s%> of the robe, <S%H4598><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> in, <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
They made <S%H6213><s%> the coats <S%H3801><s%> of fine linen <S%H8336><s%> of woven <S%H707><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> for Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and for his sons, <S%H1121><s%>

and the turban <S%H4701><s%> of fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> and the linen <S%H8336><s%> headbands <S%H4021><s%> of fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> and the linen <S%H8336><s%> breeches <S%H4370><s%> of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%>

and the sash <S%H73><s%> of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> and blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> the work of the embroiderer, <S%H7551><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

They made <S%H6213><s%> the plate <S%H6731><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> crown <S%H5145><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> and wrote <S%H3789><s%> on it a writing, <S%H4385><s%> like the engravings <S%H6603><s%> of a signet: <S%H2368><s%> "HOLY <S%H6944><s%> TO YAHWEH. <S%H3068><s%>"

They tied <S%H5414><s%> to it a lace <S%H6616><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> to fasten <S%H5414><s%> it on the turban <S%H4701><s%> above, <S%H4605><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Thus all the work <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the Tent <S%H4908><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> was finished. <S%H3615><s%> The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses; <S%H4872><s%> so they did. <S%H6213><s%>

They brought <S%H935><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> the tent, <S%H4908><s%> with all its furniture, <S%H3627><s%> its clasps, <S%H7165><s%> its boards, <S%H7175><s%> its bars, <S%H1280><s%> its pillars, <S%H5982><s%> its sockets, <S%H134><s%>

the covering <S%H4372><s%> of rams <S%H352><s%>' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red, <S%H119><s%> the covering <S%H4372><s%> of sea cow <S%H8476><s%> hides, <S%H5785><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the screen, <S%H4539><s%>
the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> with its poles, <S%H905><s%> the mercy seat, <S%H3727><s%>
the table, <S%H7979><s%> all its vessels, <S%H3627><s%> the show bread, <S%H6440><s%>

the pure <S%H2889><s%> lampstand, <S%H4501><s%> its lamps, <S%H5216><s%> even the lamps <S%H5216><s%> to be set in order, <S%H4634><s%> all its vessels, <S%H3627><s%> the oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light, <S%H3974><s%>

the golden <S%H2091><s%> altar, <S%H4196><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense, <S%H7004><s%> the screen <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent, <S%H168><s%>

the bronze <S%H5178><s%> altar, <S%H4196><s%> its grating <S%H4345><s%> of brass, <S%H5178><s%> its poles, <S%H905><s%> all of its vessels, <S%H3627><s%> the basin <S%H3595><s%> and its base, <S%H3653><s%>

the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> its pillars, <S%H5982><s%> its sockets, <S%H134><s%> the screen <S%H4539><s%> for the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> its cords, <S%H4340><s%> its pins, <S%H3489><s%> all the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> for the Tent <S%H4908><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%>

the finely worked <S%H8278><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for ministering <S%H8334><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, <S%H6944><s%> the holy garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> to minister in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office.
According to all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> all the work. <S%H5656><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3651><s%> the work, <S%H4399><s%> and behold, <S%H6213><s%> they had done it as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had commanded, <S%H6680><s%> even so had they done <S%H6213><s%> it: <S%H4872><s%> and Moses blessed them. <S%H1288><s%>
